title: Adidas’ MiCoach Train and Run app update makes Fit Smart smarter
text:
Adidas’ MiCoach Train and Run app update makes Fit Smart smarter 
Published By: DigitalTrends.com - Today 
Adidas gave its fitness app MiCoach Train and Run a major update, adding some welcome functionality to their Fit Smart band. The band is now...
